sailpoint.workflow

Class IdentityRequestLibrary.RequestItemizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.workflow.IdentityRequestLibrary.RequestItemizer
  • Enclosing class:
    IdentityRequestLibrary

    public static class IdentityRequestLibrary.RequestItemizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to help derive RequestItems from the ProvisioningPlan(s) that are passed into the workflow.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RequestItemizer(ProvisioningProject project, SailPointContext ctx)
      Initialize the Itemizer with a provisioning project that will be used to build the RequestItems.

    • Method Detail

      • setItemLimit

        public void setItemLimit(int limit)
        Ask for expansion threshold checking. Kludgey way to ask for this but I didn't want to add yet another set of signatures for refreshItems. This is intended to be used only when refreshing after approvals which is the first time we build out expansion items.

      • buildItemsFromMasterPlan

        public void buildItemsFromMasterPlan(IdentityRequest ir,
                                     boolean expandMultiValues)
                              throws GeneralException
        Extract only the master plan items, this is used to build the items list pre-approval. It does not yet include items that get expanded after things has been approved.

        This method will add items directly to the IdentityRequest object.

        Parameters:
        ir - IdentityRequest
        expandMultiValues - A flag that tells the itemizer to take values in GenericRequests and expand them into individual items.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • refreshItems

        public void refreshItems(IdentityRequest request,
                         boolean expandMultiValues)
                  throws GeneralException
        Refresh the items in an identity request. This includes adding in expansions or other things that were added to the project.

        Also we will cross reference the items to the plan so we can indicate if an item has been removed by setting the "field" to "value".

        Parameters:
        request - IdentityRequest
        expandMultiValues - A flag that tells the itemizer to take values in GenericRequests and expand them into individual items.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • refreshItems

        public void refreshItems(IdentityRequest request,
                         boolean expandMultiValues,
                         boolean detectRemoves)
                  throws GeneralException
        Refresh the items in an identity request. This includes adding in expansions or other things that were added to the project.

        Also we will cross reference the items to the plan so we can indicate if an item has been removed by setting the "field" to "value".

        Parameters:
        request - IdentityRequest
        expandMultiValues - A flag that tells the itemizer to take values in GenericRequests and expand them into individual items.
        detectRemoves - True to cross reference the items
        Throws:
        GeneralException
